synopsis.text: Things seem to be going smoothly for Shirayuki, a determined young herbalist, and Zen, the prince of Clarines, as they navigate their newfound feelings for each other. But their tranquil existence is disrupted when an old foe re-emerges, bearing news of a mysterious boy on the hunt for a girl with striking apple-red hair. As the kingdom of Clarines braces for potential danger, an invitation from the boorish Prince Raj arrives, requesting Shirayuki's presence at his upcoming ball in Tanbarun. Unprepared for the grand adventure that awaits, Shirayuki finds herself face-to-face with her past and uncertain future when the enigmatic boy finally catches up to her. As Shirayuki embarks on this thrilling journey, she must determine what destiny holds for her rare red hair and budding romance with Zen.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
